episodeTitle: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!
episodeTitleJapanese: 吹雪の死闘 麦わらの一味VS雪女
episodeTitleRomanized: Fubuki no Shitō - Mugiwara no Ichimi tai Yuki-On'na
description: Mocha desperately flees with drugged candy while pursued by the affected children. Zoro battles Monet to protect Nami, Robin, and Chopper. A flashback reveals how Mocha arrived at Punk Hazard and Caesar's manipulation of the children.

events.title: Mocha and Sind's Arrival at Punk Hazard
events.description: A flashback reveals how Mocha and Sind first arrived at Punk Hazard. Caesar Clown manipulated them by claiming they were sick and needed treatment, fabricating an emotional story about losing his own son to the same disease to gain their trust.
events.significance: Establishes the depth of Caesar's manipulation and exploitation of innocent children, showing how he lured them away from their families under false pretenses.

events.title: Mocha's Desperate Escape with the Candy
events.description: After Chopper explains that the drugged candy will eventually kill the children, Mocha makes the brave decision to flee with all the candy to prevent the other children from consuming it, despite being pursued by the drug-affected children.
events.significance: Demonstrates Mocha's selflessness and marks a turning point in the children's storyline, as she chooses to protect her friends at great personal risk.

events.title: Zoro vs Monet: The Snow Woman Battle Begins
events.description: Zoro engages in battle with Monet, the snow woman with Logia-type Devil Fruit powers. Rather than attacking offensively, Zoro fights defensively to protect Nami, Robin, and Chopper from Monet's deadly snow-based attacks.
events.significance: Showcases Zoro's strategic combat approach and introduces a prolonged battle with the formidable Logia user Monet. This battle demonstrates the challenge of fighting Logia users without Haki.

events.title: Monet Uses Yuki Gaki
events.description: Monet demonstrates her snow manipulation ability by creating a solid snow wall (Yuki Gaki) to block a doorway, preventing Nami, Robin, and Chopper from chasing after the giant children.
events.significance: First display of Monet's Yuki Gaki technique, showcasing her defensive capabilities with the Yuki Yuki no Mi.

events.title: Nami Uses Heat Egg
events.description: Nami employs her Heat Egg technique, a weather-based attack using her Clima-Tact, in an attempt to counter Monet's snow abilities.
events.significance: Demonstrates Nami's evolving mastery of her weather-based combat abilities and her strategic thinking against a snow-user.

events.title: Robin Uses Cuatro Mano: Spank
events.description: Robin manifests multiple limbs using her Hana Hana no Mi powers to execute Cuatro Mano: Spank against Monet.
events.significance: Shows Robin's continued use of her Devil Fruit abilities in combat situations.

events.title: Monet Uses Mannen Yuki
events.description: Monet completely transforms into snow and surrounds her opponents' bodies with freezing snow, weakening and immobilizing them with severe cold. This is her signature technique.
events.significance: Demonstrates the full power of Monet's Logia-type Devil Fruit and its dangerous debilitating effects.

events.title: Sanji Arrives with G-5 Marines
events.description: Sanji arrives at the scene with G-5 Marines to help in the battle against Monet. However, the Marines become distracted by Monet's appearance and prove ineffective in combat.
events.significance: Brings additional forces to the confrontation, though their effectiveness is compromised by their distraction.

events.title: Monet Uses Tabira Yuki: Hada Gatana
events.description: Monet freezes the feathers on her wings, transforming them into sharpened, solid snow-blades. She uses these ice-blades to clash with Zoro's swords, demonstrating her ability to engage in sword combat.
events.significance: Shows Monet's versatility in combat, able to transform her body parts into weapons capable of matching Zoro's swordsmanship.

events.title: Tashigi Demonstrates Haki-Infused Swordplay
events.description: Tashigi joins Zoro in fighting Monet, using a Haki-infused sword to harm the Logia-user and prevent her from attacking the G-5 Marines. This demonstrates Tashigi's growth as a swordswoman.
events.significance: Reveals that Tashigi has learned to use Busoshoku Haki, a critical ability for fighting Logia-type Devil Fruit users. Shows her development as a warrior since the timeskip.

events.title: Luffy and Momonosuke Navigate the Garbage Chute
events.description: Luffy and Momonosuke remain trapped navigating through a garbage chute, separated from the main action. Their subplot continues as they try to find their way back to the others.
events.significance: Provides comic relief while maintaining the parallel storyline of Luffy and Momonosuke's journey through the facility.

quotes.text: Why do you only block? Fight back!
quotes.speaker: Monet
quotes.context: Monet questions Zoro's defensive fighting strategy during their battle

themes.description: Mocha's decision to take all the drugged candy to protect the other children exemplifies the theme of self-sacrifice for others.
themes.symbolism: The candy represents both Caesar's manipulation and Mocha's brave choice to endure suffering for her friends.

themes.description: Caesar's backstory manipulation reveals how he exploited the children's trust and innocence, fabricating emotional stories to separate them from their families.
themes.symbolism: Caesar's false tale about his dead son symbolizes the depths of his deception and cruelty.

themes.description: Tashigi's use of Haki demonstrates her growth as a warrior since the timeskip, showing her determination to become stronger.
themes.symbolism: The Haki-infused blade represents her evolved capabilities and commitment to justice.

characterSpotlights.development: Mocha's backstory is revealed, showing how Caesar manipulated her. She makes the brave decision to protect the other children by taking all the candy.
keyActions: Remembers her arrival at Punk Hazard

characterSpotlights.development: Zoro demonstrates strategic thinking by fighting defensively to protect weaker allies rather than seeking a quick offensive victory.
Monet's full combat capabilities are on display as she uses multiple snow-based techniques to fight the Straw Hats.
keyActions: Uses Yuki Gaki to block doorways
Employs Mannen Yuki to immobilize opponents
Transforms wings into ice blades with Tabira Yuki: Hada Gatana
quotes: Why do you only block? Fight back!

characterSpotlights.development: Tashigi reveals her growth by demonstrating the ability to use Busoshoku Haki, joining Zoro in the fight against Monet.
keyActions: Protects G-5 Marines from Monet's attacks

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extended the battle scenes between Zoro and Monet compared to the manga, adding more detailed combat choreography.

trivia.fact: This episode corresponds to Chapter 686 of the manga, covering pages 2-19.
The episode features three named techniques from Monet's Yuki Yuki no Mi: Yuki Gaki, Mannen Yuki, and Tabira Yuki: Hada Gatana.

sources.title: Yuki Yuki no Mi - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: This is one of the key episodes showing Tashigi's post-timeskip abilities, specifically her mastery of Busoshoku Haki.
